Office of the Dean of Students     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Office of the Dean of Students      Office of the Dean of Students   Main Menu    About           Our Work, Mission and Values    Our Team    Student Handbook    Policies    Student Government    Religious Workers' Association    Request a Presentation    Location         Assistance           Academic Concerns    Health & Personal Concerns    Campus Life    Faculty & Staff Resources    U & I Care         Community Standards           Academic Integrity    Personal & Community Integrity    Community Standards Forms    Community Standards Process    Get Involved    Record Requests    Assessment & Reports         Student Veterans           Benefits and Forms    Get Connected    Resources for Students and Families    FAQs    Contact Student Veteran Affairs         Student Legal     Eyebrow menu    Veteran Forms    Community Standards Forms    U & I Care    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Office of the Dean of Students    Community Standards    Academic Integrity        Academic Integrity       Academic Integrity             Report Academic Misconduct             Witness Form             Submit a Sanction          ACADEMIC STANDARDS   As noted by Chancellor Amiridis, our goal at the University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC) is to “provide the broadest access to the highest levels of intellectual excellence.” Such intellectual excellence is only within our reach when individual students commit to pursuing their education with the utmost honesty.  Academic integrity, a foundational element of all educational communities, is the value underpinning everything we do at UIC. It encompasses many behaviors, but the core idea is when you choose any action one might construe as “an unfair or undeserved academic advantage 1 ”, you undermine your learning, your goals, and your relationships within the UIC community. For a complete list of UIC’s Academic Integrity standards, please reference section IV.A. of the Student Disciplinary Policy .  1 deanofstudents.utexas.edu/conduct           Student Resources  College is often the time when students solidify their values around academic integrity. Explore this page to learn more about: the importance of academic integrity; information about responding to alleged academic misconduct; resources to avoid academic violations; and common sanctions given when students are found responsible.   Learn More             Faculty & Staff Resources  Faculty are crucial partners in every step of our efforts to create a strong culture of academic integrity at UIC. From syllabus statements to misconduct reporting, learn more here about support available for faculty and staff, plus some of the research-backed steps you can take to encourage academic integrity on campus.
